title: LiFi Token Transfer
description: Cross-chain token transfer and swap capabilities using the LiFi protocol

token_quote.title: Token Quote
token_quote.description: Get token transfer quotes without executing transactions

token_execute.title: Token Execute
token_execute.description: Execute token transfers (requires CDP wallet and cdp skills enabled)

default_slippage.title: Default Slippage
default_slippage.description: Default slippage tolerance for token transfers (e.g., 0.03 for 3%)

allowed_chains.title: Allowed Chains
allowed_chains.description: List of blockchain networks that can be used (if empty, all supported chains are allowed)

max_execution_time.title: Maximum Execution Time
max_execution_time.description: Maximum time (in seconds) to wait for transaction confirmation for token_execute
